They were very flexible, making themselves available whenever we had questions or wanted a look at a home via video. Their input and assessment proved trustworthy and quickly  brought us into homeownership in town.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks so much Maria. Please continue to ask for help at any point as you make your move to Bellingham. We are honored to be part of this big life decision for you and your family.

reviews.author: Annie Graham
reviews.review: We worked with Layla Pollack in Laurie Satushek's office, and it was great!  She helped us buy a home before we moved to Bellingham, ensuring every step of the process went smoothly.  She had immense knowledge of the local area and market, and was a great advocate on our behalf.  Could not recommend her more highly!

reviews.author: Ryan McCauley
reviews.review: We had a fantastic home buying experience with the Satushek team. Jenni was very knowledgeable and helpful during showings and patient throughout the process.

ownerResponse.text: We are so happy to hear you had a great experience with Jenni! Congratulations on purchasing your first home!

reviews.author: Allan Pelletier
reviews.review: My wife and I recently purchased a second home/vacation home (future retirement home) in Bellingham.

reviews.author: John Ferguson
reviews.review: Jenni was very encouraging and helpful in providing the Satushek  services. They all made the whole process understandable, and their help and follow-up on the paperwork was very much appreciated. I would definitely recommend them!

ownerResponse.text: Thanks so much, John! It was our pleasure. We are happy to hear you are satisfied with the services we provided. Happy to help anytime you need it. Cheers!

reviews.author: Charis Weathers
reviews.review: As a first-time home buyer I was quite nervous to enter the market as a buyer. Jen Glyzinski, of Laurie Satushek's team, made my experience easy. Jen knew what needed to be done, gave great advice, and led me through a very confusing process with ease and good humor. I highly recommend this team!

reviews.author: Molly Monahan
reviews.review: Generous with their expertise and their time. I can count on these folks  to help no matter what. Community building seems to be their goal, and they succeed at that hands down. The most important factor in choosing a real estate agent is trust. They have earned mine for certain.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you so much, Molly. We truly appreciate you and your review!

reviews.review: Jenni and the rest of the team went above and beyond for us, and helped guide us through the whole home-buying process as we relocated to Bellingham. We highly recommend them!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you so much for your kind word! Welcome to Bellingham!

reviews.review: Great group of friendly and knowledgeable people. They are also very active in giving back to the community.  Recommend!
